titleStmt.title: The character of a rebel a sermon preached at Market Harborow, on the 26th of July, 1685, being the day of thanksgiving appointed for His Majesties victory over the rebels / by Thomas Heyricke.
titleStmt.author: Heyrick, Thomas, d. 1694.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
